thread.title: lovely hotel,good location
thread.title_full: lovely hotel,good location - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: pete B
title: lovely hotel,good location
text:
Stayed for 1 night using a travelzoo voucher. B&B + glass of wine, excellent value. Staff were very friendly and helpful, giving advice on bus routes etc.
Room was compact but fine for 1 night, very quiet, clean and comfortable, free wifi. Breakfast was outstanding, continental meat /cheese options, fresh fruit, yoghurts, pastries, juices, teas + coffee all regularly refreshed plus full english which was very well cooked and delicious.
very relaxed atmosphere no feeling of being rushed.
would definately recommend to friends & family
Room Tip: we had 3rd floor looking onto street at rear, pretty mews, nice and quiet See more room tips
